title.value: Энергетическая и экономическая эффективность возделывания сортообразцов галеги восточной на корм и семена
Power and economic efficiency of goat's rue variety samples for fodder and seeds

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Zhuravskij, A.S., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies on the energy and economic evaluation of sample types of goat's rue (Galega orientalis L.) grown for green mass and seeds. Selected variety samples were characterized by high yield of green mass and seeds had a high profitability of cultivation for seeds 69.4-203,5%, to green mass – 171,5-225,2%. Agricultural energy coefficient when cultivating for green mass was 4,9-7,7. The highest profitability while gorowing for seeds was showed by BGSHA-2 variety sample (203,5%) and for the green mass - BGSH-2 (215,4%) and SEG-1 (225,2%), with a coefficient of energy performance 6,9 and 7,7.
